name: SickWrongPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open Sick Wrong Podcast”
”Alexa, start Sick Wrong Podcast”
”Alexa, ask Sick Wrong Podcast”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sick wrong podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sick and Wrong is your hearing aid into the dark, depraved, and dripping abscess that is contemporary existence. An enchanting mélange of social criticism, pointed observation, and well-deserved derision; Sick and Wrong is the Pepto-Bismol for society’s indigestion.
In their critically acclaimed weekly podcast, award-winning broadcasters Dee Simon and Harrison discuss the most vile, disquieting, and oddly amusing news items for your listening pleasure. Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands: **Next/Previous Episode** — [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next” — [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous” **Select Latest Episode** — “Alexa, ask Sick Wrong Podcast to play latest episode” **Select First Episode** — “Alexa, ask Sick Wrong Podcast to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
